Class WithdrawalRequest

java.lang.Object
entity.WithdrawalRequest
public class WithdrawalRequest extends Object
Represents a student's request to withdraw from an internship application.

This domain model manages the complete lifecycle of a withdrawal request, from creation through staff processing. It maintains an audit trail of all processing actions and ensures proper coordination with the associated internship application.

Lifecycle States:

  • PENDING - Request created, awaiting staff processing
  • APPROVED - Request approved by staff, application updated accordingly
  • REJECTED - Request rejected by staff, application remains unchanged

Key Features:

  • Maintains audit trail of staff processing actions
  • Coordinates with internship application state changes
  • Handles both accepted and pending application withdrawals
  • Provides reason tracking for both students and staff

  • Constructor Details

    • WithdrawalRequest

      public WithdrawalRequest(InternshipApplication application, Student requestedBy, String reason)
      Creates a new withdrawal request for the specified application. Validates that the requesting student owns the application being withdrawn.
      Parameters:
      application - the internship application being withdrawn (must belong to requester)
      requestedBy - the student requesting the withdrawal
      reason - optional free-text reason for withdrawal (will be trimmed)
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if application or requestedBy is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if requester does not match application owner

  • Method Details

    • getRequestId

      public String getRequestId()
      Returns the unique withdrawal request identifier.
      Returns:
      the request ID in format "WRQ####"

    • getApplication

      public InternshipApplication getApplication()
      Returns the internship application being withdrawn.
      Returns:
      the associated internship application

    • getRequestedBy

      public Student getRequestedBy()
      Returns the student who requested the withdrawal.
      Returns:
      the requesting student

    • getRequestedOn

      public LocalDate getRequestedOn()
      Returns the date when the withdrawal request was created.
      Returns:
      the request creation date

    • getReason

      public String getReason()
      Returns the student's reason for withdrawal.
      Returns:
      the reason text (may be empty string if no reason provided)

    • getStatus

      public WithdrawalRequestStatus getStatus()
      Returns the current processing status of the request.
      Returns:
      the withdrawal request status

    • getProcessedBy

      public CareerCenterStaff getProcessedBy()
      Returns the staff member who processed the request.
      Returns:
      the processing staff member, or null if still pending

    • getProcessedOn

      public LocalDate getProcessedOn()
      Returns the date when the request was processed.
      Returns:
      the processing date, or null if still pending

    • getStaffNote

      public String getStaffNote()
      Returns the optional note added by processing staff.
      Returns:
      the staff note, or null if no note provided

    • isPending

      public boolean isPending()
      Checks if the request is still awaiting staff action.
      Returns:
      true if status is PENDING, false otherwise

    • setReason

      public void setReason(String reason)
      Updates the student's reason text for the withdrawal request. This operation is only allowed while the request is still PENDING.
      Parameters:
      reason - the new reason text
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the request has already been processed

    • approve

      public void approve(CareerCenterStaff staff, String note)
      Approves the withdrawal request and updates related aggregates atomically.

      Processing Logic:

      • If student had confirmed acceptance: frees up the internship slot and unsets acceptance
      • If application was PENDING or SUCCESSFUL (unconfirmed): marks application as WITHDRAWN
      Parameters:
      staff - the career center staff member performing the approval
      note - optional note from staff explaining the decision
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if staff is null
      IllegalStateException - if request is not in PENDING status

    • reject

      public void reject(CareerCenterStaff staff, String note)
      Rejects the withdrawal request. The associated internship application remains unchanged.
      Parameters:
      staff - the career center staff member performing the rejection
      note - optional note from staff explaining the rejection
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if staff is null
      IllegalStateException - if request is not in PENDING status
